item.title: Introducing Indigo
item.description: Indigo is a lightweight theme for Hugo with IndieWeb features baked in. It’s great for longer-form blogging, placing its focus on distraction-free reading and beautiful typefaces.

item.title: Featured Typefaces
item.description: Indigo uses a combination of three beautiful typefaces to render your words.

item.title: Author Bios
item.description: The bottom of every page in the theme can optionally show a short biography of the site author, including a profile picture, email link, and location.
